content: ** christmas tree ornament ** add a touch of handmade charm to your holiday decor with this free crochet pattern for an adorable christmas tree ornament this easy tutorial is ideal for advanced beginners guiding you through creating a mini flat christmas tree-shaped ornament complete with a cheerful star topper a cute smiley face and tiny legs simply delightful this crochet pattern is 4 pages long and includes progress photos ** supplies ** dk / light worsted / #3 yarn 4mm crochet hook scissors sewing needle 10mm safety eyes black embroidery thread ** skill level ** easy ** yarn ** weight - dk / light worsted / #3 brand - stylecraft squeeze me dk a - green b - brown c - pink d - yellow total 27 yards ** gauge ** 2 x 2 gauge swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet ** size ** width 8 5cm x height 10cm ** stitches used usa terminology ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet 2dc 2 double_crochet in 1 space increase magic_ring magic_ring r row / round single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet
